title: 6 months
intro: At 6 months, your baby will start using sounds to express emotion. She/he may mimic sounds she/he hears, like 'ma', 'da', 'ah', 'oh', and even 'no!' Your little one will begin to recognize familiar faces, reach and grasp for toys and will soon be crawling â€” start preparing your home (and yourself) for a mobile child!
